articles.title: Afghanistan earthquake: More than 800 dead, thousands injured
articles.description: A powerful earthquake struck eastern Afghanistan, destroying villages and killing over 800 people, with thousands more injured. The quake was felt in neighboring Pakistan as well.

articles.title: Rudy Giuliani injured in New Hampshire car crash
articles.description: Former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani was hospitalized after his car was struck from behind on a highway in New Hampshire. He reportedly fractured a vertebra.

articles.title: China's Xi Jinping criticizes 'bullying behavior' at Shanghai summit
articles.description: Chinese leader Xi Jinping urged leaders at the Shanghai Cooperation Organization summit to "seek integration, not decoupling" and "unequivocally oppose power politics," in a veiled criticism of U.S. influence.
